scripts.make_link: mkdir -p node_modules && cd node_modules && rm -fr xeira && ln -fs ../../.. xeira
scripts.lint: npm run make_link && node ../../bin/xeira.mjs lint src
scripts.transpile: npm run make_link && node ../../bin/xeira.mjs transpile src lib
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run transpile && npm run bundle
